messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] internal support
messages.msgSnippet: ... This is interesting and I hope to hear a lot of suggestions on this (Before I have to leave i net access on Monday for a few weeks). Its extremely
messages.messageBody:
>Hmmmm....now ya got me wondering if we are dealing with the same man here!
> LOL
>
>Jennifer



This is interesting and I hope to hear a lot of suggestions on this
(Before I have to leave i'net access on Monday for a few weeks).

Its extremely important for an unschooling environment to be nurturing.
After all, we all get enough flak from outside sources.

But what happens when that flak is from an inside source. From a source
that prolly has had some pretty deep rooted unfavourable experiences in
childhood - hence the issues now.


Lets go on the assumption that it would take just as long to help this
person see a glimmer of light as it would to get the kid(s) onto to
higher education or a career.

How does one deal with the negative input?


Kolleen
